name: py-entrypoints
description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-flit
dependencies.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.

dependencies.name: py-configparser
dependencies.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-flake8
dependent_to.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: py-keyring
dependent_to.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.

dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel
dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.
